item.description:
This will be an awesome networking and social event at a great location in downtown Boston!
Boston Event Guide always does a great job with their various events around Boston, and this will be no exception.

The event takes place at the Hyatt Regency Hotel, outdoors on their patio (or indoors if it's raining).
The event runs from 6pm until 11pm.
*** PLEASE NOTE: Event runs from 6pm, but I will only be there from 8pm ***
*** due to unavoidable changes in my schedule for this Thursday ***

For additional information and to buy your ticket online, go to:
Boston Event Guide - Networking Party

Note:
  • Attendance is limited to 200 people and several Boston social and networking groups are advertising this event. Buy your ticket ASAP to ensure you can get in. There may not be any tickets sold at the door.
  • Attendance fee is $15 in total for Boston Event Guide members (NO ADDITIONAL SERVICE FEES), $20 for non-members.
  • Check the hotel web-site for directions etc. The hotel has its own parking garage which is very convenient if you're driving into Boston for the event.
item.how_to_find_us: Head to the outdoor patio (or check for indoor location if raining)
item.name: Boston Event Guide: Summer Patio Networking Party
